name: Bankrupt Heroines 2
description:
Bankrupt Heroines 2 is a side-scrolling platformer action game.
Run and Gun, kill the monsters with silly stories and sexy artwork!
Purchase and upgrade weapons with rewards from defeating monsters!
Keep getting stronger is the only way to survive in this apocalyptic world.



The world is doomed. tax was raised up to 99%.
The evil cat is threatening innocent people to eat fresh fruit and vegetables in nasty ways
Heroines will fight monsters and killing taxes for their life

This game contains sexual contents. and not recommended for people who are allergic to boobs
